
3.4.1 / 2018-03-08
==================

**others**
  * [[`55a7a5c`](http://github.com/node-modules/agentkeepalive/commit/55a7a5cd33e97f9a8370083dcb041c5552f10ac9)] - test: stop timer after test end (fengmk2 <<fengmk2@gmail.com>>)
